text: @realDonaldTrump You r nuts. Everyone in our country has been impacted  by the coronavirus, the unemployed, teachers, students and their parents, the infected, Congress, our medical and science experts, the families and friends of those infected, hospitalized or dead. YOU are doing nothing. FU!
